description: Lists models created with the CreateModel API.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Enumerating SageMaker models reveals which environments and accounts run sensitive ML workloads.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.technique: T1530 - Data from Cloud Storage Object
unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Model metadata often references model artifacts in S3, providing a map to potential data-theft targets.

incidents.description: AI-assisted cloud intrusion achieves admin access in 8 minutes

securityImplications: Attackers might use ListModels to inventory proprietary ML assets, determine which ones are most valuable, and plan exfiltration or sabotage.
